Description: Body sherd of Chian Grand Style or Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky brown with part of pomegranate rosette in faded added white; exterior reserved.
Curator's comments: For the pomegranate rosette, see British Museum 1924,1201.301.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0864) (phase 2)
